name: Marine debris status
description: Status of marine debris, measured by FAD groundings

name: Contamination status
description: Status score scaled 0-1 for contamination

description: Coral condition based on the percent of live coral cover in different reef zones

name: Rainforest status
description: Rainforest status based on area of rainforest compared to potential area

description: Estimated change in  rainforest area over time

name: Carbon storage status
description: Carbon storage status based on rainforest habitats

name: Coastal protection status
description: Coastal protection status determined by coral reef condition

name: Iconic species status
description: Average status for iconic species by region

name: Proportion of inland protected areas
description: Proportion of inland protected areas within 1km

name: Proportion of marine protected areas
description: Proportion of marine protected areas within 3nm offshore

description: Survey responses by country to the Convention on Biological Diversity (CBD) Third National Report: mariculture related questions

name: Management of tourism to preserve biodiversity
description: Survey responses by country to the Convention on Biological Diversity (CBD) Third National Report: tourism related questions

name: CITES signatories
description: Convention on International Trade in Endangered Species of Wild Fauna and Flora (CITES) signatories

name: Economic diversity
description: Sector evenness based on Shannon's Diversity Index calculated on the proportion of jobs in each sector as a measure of economic diversity

name: Mariculture Sustainability Index
description: Mariculture practice assessment criteria from the Mariculture Sustainability Index (MSI)

name: Region areas based on EEZ boundaries
description: Area of Ocean Health Index regions modified from exclusive economic zones, weights used to calculate global score

name: OHI region id
description: Subset of regions that are not deleted or disputed

name: Regions
description: Regions by type (eez, subocean, unclaimed)

name: Uninhabited regions
description: Regions with low and no number of inhabitants (also identifies Southern Islands)

name: Percent direct employment in tourism
description: Percent direct employment in tourism

name: Tourism sustainability index
description: Tourism Competitiveness Index (TTCI)

name: Coastal protection weights
description: Habitat extent multiplied by habitat protection rank for: coral, mangrove (offshore and inland 1km), saltmarsh, sea ice (shoreline), and seagrass (empty dataframe filled by functions.R in ohi-global)

name: Carbon storage weights
description: Habitat extent multiplied by carbon storage capacity for: mangrove, saltmarsh, and seagrass  (empty dataframe filled by functions.R in ohi-global)

name: Habitat presence/absence
description: List of habitats in each region (empty dataframe filled by functions.R in ohi-global)

name: Habitat extent of softbottom
description: Area of softbottom habitat

name: Management of nonindigenous species
description: Survey responses by country to the Convention on Biological Diversity (CBD) Third National Report: invasive species related questions
